From: Shubham Mishra, ValiantIQ Inc smishra@valiantiq.com Reply to: smishra@valiantiq.com Client: UPS
Position: Business System Analyst
Location: Alpharetta, GA (Hybrid)
Experience: 6+ years
Onsite (In person Interview) NOTE: LOCAL candidates are prioritized FIRST by UPS
Hybrid – 3 days onsite
Will require an onsite interview in the final round
Experience in logistics domain
CANDIDATE INFO: Full Name: Employer: Visa Status: Location/Zip Code: Availability: Rate: Contact number: Email Address: Phone Type (iOS/Android): Onsite Interview (Y/N):
SKILLS (years of experience): Business analysis - Team Foundation Server (TFS) - User Stories - Functional Testing - Project Life Cycle - TFS Status Updates - 
EDUCATION BACKGROUND: Master’s Degree: University/Location: Bachelor’s Degree: University/Location: CERTIFICATIONS: 
Responsibilities: Prepare business requirements using Use Cases, Screen Shots and providing examples for new features. Create User Stories for development teams from the Business Requirements clearly elaborating logic. Performing end to end project tasks, testing and delivery of all user stories within established SLA's. Creating User Stories, and updating status based on project phase. Analyzing the business requirements and filling gap in requirements. Part of reviews of functional specifications, understand the requirements, and validate. Coordinated with Functional user representatives, Development Team, RUN teams, in testing and implementing various change requests. 
Required Skills: Knowledge of TFS Writing User Stories Functional Testing Project Life Cycle TFS Status Updates
Thanks & Regards, Shubham Mishra Technical Recruiter- ValiantIQ Inc.
